item.title: These AI Agents Ain't It - Dev Leader Weekly 94
item.description: Welcome to another issue of Dev Leader Weekly! In this issue, I discuss my experience using AI agents to refactor code. Link to article: https://www.devleader.ca/2025/05/10/these-ai-agents-aint-it-dev-leader-weekly-94
